# contentInsetsReference

**Instance Property**

The boundary to reference when defining content insets.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentInsetsReference: UIContentInsetsReference { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property represents the reference point to use when defining [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSCollectionLayoutSection/contentInsets].

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentInsetsReference/automatic], which means the section follows the layout configuration’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCompositionalLayoutConfiguration/contentInsetsReference].

## Configuring section spacing

- **interGroupSpacing**: The amount of space between the groups in the section.
- **contentInsets**: The amount of space between the content of the section and its boundaries.
- **supplementaryContentInsetsReference**: The reference boundary for content insets on boundary supplementary items.
- **UIContentInsetsReference**: Constants that describe the reference point of the content insets.
